title: Parking
excerpt: Multi-platform ads listing system with advanced search engine for cars, motors, properties, and automotive brands.
description: Ads listing platform aggregating content from popular sources into a single site using an advanced search engine. Multi-application project handling car ads, motors, properties, and specialized platforms for JLR group and Hyundai with integrated payment processing and CRM.
tasks: Integrated external services through APIs (insurance flash quotation, Deepl translation, Monday CRM, YouTube)
Migrated from SOAP API to REST API architecture

achievements: Upgraded Sphinx search engine from v2.2 to v3.0, improving performance by migrating to Sphinx SQL syntax
Reduced API calls through strategic caching and conditional logic
Improved SEO and performance scores on PageSpeed Insights by reducing blocking scripts and unused CSS
Successfully upgraded jQuery to 3.6, jQuery UI to latest version, and PHP to 8.2
Enhanced SQL query performance by reducing multi-join statements through new tables and memcached caching
contributions: Prevented SQL injection using prepared statements
Migrated JavaScript from old function syntax to class-based syntax

title: Blindlove
excerpt: Anonymous dating application with intelligent matching algorithm based on preferences and interests.
description: Innovative dating platform featuring an anonymous matching algorithm that uses weighted preferences, cosine similarity, and bitmap interests for optimal user matching. Built with real-time communication capabilities, multi-language support, and scalable architecture using Node.js clustering and Redis for high-performance operations.
